attributes.action: pass a law in which all EU legiaslation, directives etc. must be passed by a vote in Parliament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: many forms of legislation - regulations, directives, regulations, etc - become law in the UK without any formal vote in Parliament. This bill would at least enable our own parliament to vote on and pass these acts before they become law.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
